title: Entrata API Request — entrata
text: function sends HTTP request Entrata API. Use function base template create HTTP requests Entrata API. function used functions package create requests Entrata API.

title: Entrata API Request — entrata
code: entrata(   endpoint = NULL,   method = NULL,   params = list(NULL),   ua = user_agent(),   verbosity = NULL,   perform = FALSE,   extract = perform,   enable_retry = FALSE,   max_retries = 3,   retry_delay = 1,   config = config::get("entrata"),   ... )

title: Entrata API Request — entrata
text: endpoint Entrata API Endpoint send request . Default NULL. See details available endpoints. method Entrata API Method use request. confused HTTP request method (.e. GET, POST), method must method available Entrata API specified endpoint. default value depends whether endpoint parameter provided, available default value first method listed endpoint. endpoint specified, NULL used method request body. See details available methods endpoint details structure request. params List parameters use request. Default empty list. endpoint methods required parameters must provided request. See details information structure request required parameters endpoint method. ua User Agent string use request. Default use user_agent(). verbosity much information print? wrapper around req_verbose() uses integer control verbosity: 0: output 1: show headers 2: show headers bodies 3: show headers, bodies, curl status messages. Use with_verbosity() control verbosity requests affect directly. perform Logical value indicating whether perform request. Default FALSE. FALSE, function return request object without performing request. TRUE, function perform request return response object. extract Logical value indicating whether extract response. Default value perform. TRUE, function extract response object return . FALSE, function return response object . max_retries Maximum number times retry request. Default 3. request fails, function retry request max_retries times returning error. retry_delay Number seconds wait retries. Default 1. function wait retry_delay seconds retrying request. delay retries increase exponentially retry. config Entrata API Configuration Values list. Default use config::get("entrata") retrieve configuration values config.yml configuration file. configuration values include following keys: username, password, base_url. See details. ... Additional arguments currently use.

title: Entrata API Request — entrata
text: httr2::request() object Entrata API request.

title: Entrata API Request — entrata
text: function creates request Entrata API using httr2 package. Specifically, function creates HTTP POST request Entrata API appending request's URL path provided endpoint, assigning POST HTTP Method, adding necessary authentication, populating necessary request headers, deriving request's body using provided method name params parameters. See details. raw format base template request:   Authorization header Basic authentication header provided username password body JSON encoded data object using provided method params:
